6.title: On the cruise
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: French language mini-series pilot about a man named Denis who reunites with an ex-lover from 30 years prior named Estelle in Miami Beach. Estelle picks Denis up in a 1965 Cadillac Deville and drives him to PortMiami to board a cruise ship to spend a couple days together. During the drive, they reminisce about their lives together in the past and catch each other up on what they've been doing in the meantime. The stakes are raised when Denis inadvertently tells her too soon that he's sold his home in France and wishes to live with her in Miami.

plot: French language mini-series pilot about a man named Denis who reunites with an ex-lover from 30 years prior named Estelle in Miami Beach.

French language mini-series pilot about a man named Denis who reunites with an ex-lover from 30 years prior named Estelle in Miami Beach. Estelle picks Denis up in a 1965 Cadillac Deville and drives him to PortMiami to board a cruise ship to spend a couple days together. During the drive, they reminisce about their lives together in the past and catch each other up on what they've been doing in the meantime. The stakes are raised when Denis inadvertently tells her too soon that he's sold his home in France and wishes to live with her in Miami.
